title: News Gothic with round punctuation
content:
Is there a typeface like News Gothic (or Trade Gothic, Franklin Gothic, Benton etc) with round punctuation but not rounded terminals on the letterforms? I took a look at the similar fonts recommended by Identifont and didn't see anything...

Thanks!
author: bizarrogir

comments.content: You could easily make one, and I'm sure several type designers on these forums would happily produce something custom as a commission. Can't think of an existing face off the top of my head.

If you only need narrow styles, maybe this: [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/lettering-inc/directors-gothic/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418105707/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/lettering-inc/directors-gothic/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/lettering-inc/directors-gothic/")

Core Sans G  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/s-core/core-sans-g/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418105707/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/s-core/core-sans-g/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/s-core/core-sans-g/")  
Novecento Sans  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/synthview/novecento/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418105707/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/synthview/novecento/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/synthview/novecento/")  
Trump Gothic  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/trump-gothic-pro/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418105707/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/trump-gothic-pro/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/trump-gothic-pro/")  
don
Directors Gothic is awesome, but a little too squarish. I think Novecento Sans will work well though. Thanks!!!
